title: Real-time small area estimation of food security in Zimbabwe: integrating mobile-phone and face-to-face surveys using joint multilevel regression and poststratification
summary: This paper focuses on real-time small area estimation of food security by integrating mobile-phone and face-to-face survey data in Zimbabwe. It highlights the use of scalable and temporally rich data sources for monitoring food security.
usefulness_reason: The paper directly addresses "real-time small area estimation" and integrates "mobile-phone and face-to-face surveys", making it highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal" (real-time and small area) and "Survey data". The context of food security also implies a "Contextual dataset".
